[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Neurohub System (NHS) defines requirements for managing experimental data, workflows, and collaboration.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: NHS supports data uploads, metadata management, experiment tracking, and remote access.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: NHS integrates with lab devices, metadata systems, and APIs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: NHS provides web and desktop interfaces for data management.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: NHS operates on servers and connected lab devices.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: NHS optimizes storage for large datasets and metadata operations.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: NHS ensures continuous availability with scheduled maintenance.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: NHS supports multilingual metadata and configurable lab settings.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: NHS connects to repositories and version control systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 MISSING-TAG2: NHS supports APIs for workflow integration and data sharing.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: NHS facilitates data uploads, workflow tracking, role-based collaboration, and metadata search.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: NHS serves researchers, lab administrators, and system engineers.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: NHS depends on network stability and device compatibility.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Experiment: A structured set of data and workflows.
Metadata: Descriptive information about data files.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 MISSING-TAG1: NHS requires compliance with data privacy and laboratory research standards.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall support hierarchical organization of experiments and data (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall allow metadata entry, search, and linking of related files.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall enable role-based access to experimental data (REQ-ATTR-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall track workflow execution and results for reproducibility.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with lab devices for automated data collection (REQ-DB-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall provide APIs for third-party tool integration.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-003: The system shall enable secure communication with external repositories.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall upload files over 1GB within 10 seconds.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support 1,000 concurrent users.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store metadata with indexing for optimized search.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall manage file versions and track provenance.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with GDPR and encrypt all data in transit and at rest.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to ISO standards for research data security.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall enforce role-based access control (RBAC) with audit logging of user activity (REQ-FUNC-003).
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall maintain 99.9% uptime with automatic failover and real-time monitoring alerts.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive interface with multilingual support.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Verification includes tests for metadata accuracy, file uploads, and workflow tracking.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Includes API documentation, system architecture, and compliance reports.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR, ISO standards, and Neurohub documentation.
